meanings.definition: A woman who operates a camera to capture images or videos.
meanings.sent1: The camerawoman filmed the school play.
meanings.sent2: The camerawoman took stunning photos at the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The camerawoman accidentally recorded her own feet instead of the event.
meanings.sent4: She was a silent observer, her camera a magical wand.
meanings.sent5: The camerawoman's lens captured every detail of the bustling city street.

meanings.definition: A female professional photographer who specializes in using a camera to take pictures.
meanings.sent1: The talented camerawoman was hired for the fashion shoot.
meanings.sent2: As a camerawoman, she traveled the world to photograph wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The camerawoman joked that her camera was her best friend.
meanings.sent4: Her camera was her paintbrush, creating masterpieces with light.
meanings.sent5: The skilled camerawoman's photos told stories without words.
